review:
**** **** **** 
Overall nice hospital,
Value for mone
Scientific explanation for my daughter ailments

My son had Mesenteric lymp nodes, had shown him few hospitals with dr. Who had more than 20 yrs of experience both paediatrics and paediatrics surgeons. They said it will go away in few weeks but we're not able to cure the stomach pain which used to occur almost daily.
We met Dr v c srinivas and within 1 week his pain was reduced almost by 70-80%.*** ** *** **** ************
I started consulting since my daughter was 10th months old.Doctor is very friendly and kindhearted person i know. I felt much comfortable with him more than other. ** ** *** ******* *******
